title: Did Trump accidentally boost direct giving?
description: When billionaire Michael Dell was 8 years old, he opened his first savings account.  Every time that young Michael forked a quarter over to the bank teller, he felt a rush from the “power of compound interest,” as he said from the White House on Tuesday, hour…
content: Michael and Susan Dell gifted an unprecedented $6.25 billion that will benefit 25 million kids through the so-called Trump accounts created in the tax bill earlier this year. | Andrew Caballero-Reyno… [+12277 chars]
